text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Walking past the training course<n>some days later, I spot a
familiar<n>figure dashing down the homestretch.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's Silence Suzuka. Her trainer's<n>nowhere to be seen, so I
assume that<n>she's doing some solo practice.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... Ah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I rush over to the collapsed Silence<n>Suzuka to make sure
she's not hurt.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Oh... s-sorry. I'm fine, really. My legs<n>are just... feeling a bit
heavy.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I wonder... Maybe not...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I've been feeling strange ever since<n>my last scrimmage
race.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
It feels as if there's a ball and chain<n>attached to one of my
ankles. And no<n>matter how much I run, all I see is<n>
darkness...
choice_data_list: Maybe you're pushing yourself too hard.
Maybe you're pushing yourself too hard.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Too hard? ...I don't think so. This was<n>never a problem for
me before.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I used to be able to run without a care<n>in the world. It was
everything to me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
But now... What should I do? ...I've<n>never felt this way
before.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I've never felt like... like... I don't<n>even want to run...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her expression in no way resembles<n>that look of pure bliss
I am so used to<n>seeing as she runs.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I fear that she's losing sight of her<n>ultimate passion. There
has to be<n>something I can do...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Phew! A quiet course all to myself...<n>Running at night is the
best.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
And maybe it's just my imagination,<n>but the stars seem a
little brighter than<n>usual tonight.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Hehe. I've got this scenery all to<n>myself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Come to think of it, she spoke so<n>fondly of her beautiful
view that<n>evening. Perhaps Suzuka likes taking<n>in the
scenery?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: In that case...
choice_data_list: Would you like to try running somewhere else?
Would you like to try running somewhere else?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Somewhere else?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A wonderful view...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Is there really such a place near the<n>academy? I feel like
I'm quite used to<n>all the sights around here...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Will you really?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fortunately, I have just the place in<n>mind. The surroundings
are awash<n>with lush greenery, and there is<n>plenty of
wide-open space to run.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Wow...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
The sky cleared up while we were on<n>the train. There's so
much greenery,<n>bathing in sunlight... It's beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And this path here... Just where does<n>it lead?
choice_data_list: Why don't you take a run and find out?
Why don't you take a run and find out?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Oh...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...Good idea. I'll be back soon!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... Phew.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (My legs still feel a bit heavy. But...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: ...What a nice breeze. It's so cool and<n>refreshing.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Okay... I think I'll run a bit more.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(The feeling of kicking up dirt with my<n>feet... My body getting
hot... The cool<n>breeze...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (This is it. This feeling... Running like<n>this...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: (This is my ideal scenery...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
(Absolute silence. With only the<n>sounds of the wind and my
own<n>beating heart. This world is mine...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: And mine alone!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... Phew.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Yes, very. It's been a while since<n>I've been able to just run
without a<n>care.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thank you... It made me remember...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I loved running like this even when I<n>was little. One day, my
parents<n>encouraged me to try running in a<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
As long as I was running, I was<n>happy, so I agreed to the
race... But... it<n>was really tough at first.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I was surrounded by other children...<n>It was noisy, and I felt
trapped.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
So I ran... all the way to the front,<n>where there was nobody
but me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I needed to go somewhere away<n>from the others,
where they wouldn't<n>be able to catch up with me. So I ran<n>
as fast as I could... and suddenly<n>everything opened up in
front of me.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
It was... quiet. And I was alone. I<n>reached a place nobody
else could.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I... need to run in the lead.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
...I need to reach that place, even if<n>it's just once more! I
don't care<n>about anything else!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I think I should tell my trainer exactly<n>how I feel. That I can't
run if I'm not<n>in the front.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... So maybe... Would you...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Would you mind accompanying me<n>when I tell her? I'm not
very good at<n>speaking, you see...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: S-so, please come with me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, we return to the academy to<n>talk to Silence
Suzuka's trainer...
